tool_description: This API is for checking for plagiarism in content of various kinds.
name: Artificial Intelligence Plagiarism checker
title: Artificial Intelligence Plagiarism checker

api_list.name: Plagiarism detecting Endpoint
api_list.description: This POST endpoint detect if the content given with it is created by robot or humans. Where the result data will display two of real and fake probability denoting human and robot value respectively. If the real probability is greater, then the content is built by human and vice versa.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://artificial-intelligence-plagiarism-checker.p.rapidapi.com/textDetector"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "artificial-intelligence-plagiarism-checker.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://artificial-intelligence-plagiarism-checker.p.rapidapi.com/textDetector"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "artificial-intelligence-plagiarism-checker.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
